name: Yucca Tree Cafe
address: 1347 Johnston Rd, White Rock, BC V4B 3Z3, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Big Breakfast Special
hasMenuItem.description: Two large eggs, cooked the way you like 'em, with bacon, pan fries, two slices of toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice
hasMenuItem.description: Freshly squeezed orange juice, available in small (8 oz) or large (12 oz).

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon, Lettuce, and Tomato Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Self explanatory and delicious!

hasMenuItem.name: Fruit Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. A delicious blend of fresh-cut seasonal fruits cut fresh when you order!!

hasMenuItem.name: French Toast, Bacon, and Pan Fries Special
hasMenuItem.description: Whole wheat bread, dipped in eggs, cream and cinnamon, then grilled to perfection. Served with bacon and pan fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy thick-cut, smoked to perfection.

hasMenuItem.name: Strawberry Icing Waffle
hasMenuItem.description: Strawberry and light cream cheese, topped with whipped cream, and comes with bacon and pan fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Eggs Yucca-Dict
hasMenuItem.description: Two large eggs and shaved ham, piled on a homemade biscuit and topped with lots of hollandaise sauce and green onions. Served with pan fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Clubhouse Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: A bacon, lettuce, and tomato sandwich combined with a fresh turkey sandwich makes this triple-decker delight!

hasMenuItem.name: Croissant Special
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Grilled tomato, two scrambled eggs, and cheddar piled into a fresh French butter croissant. Served with pan fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Big Breakfast Special
hasMenuItem.description: Two large eggs, cooked the way you like 'em, with bacon, pan fries, two slices of toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Mexican Breakfast Special
hasMenuItem.description: The big breakfast above, with grated cheddar cheese and homemade authentic Mexican salsa piled on the eggs.

hasMenuItem.name: Eggs Shrimpy-Dict
hasMenuItem.description: Substitute fresh shrimp for the ham on the Yucca-dict above, add tomato and ta-da... a wonderful seafood delight.

hasMenuItem.name: Small Breakfast Special
hasMenuItem.description: One large egg, bacon, pan fries, and one slice of toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Captain Yucca's Mighty Breakfast
hasMenuItem.description: Huge! Three large eggs, bacon, shaved ham, loads of pan fries, grated cheddar cheese, and two slices of toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Eggs Yucca-Dict
hasMenuItem.description: Two large eggs and shaved ham, piled on a homemade biscuit and topped with lots of hollandaise sauce and green onions. Served with pan fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Croissant Special
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Grilled tomato, two scrambled eggs, and cheddar piled into a fresh French butter croissant. Served with pan fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Croissant Special
hasMenuItem.description: Ham, two scrambled eggs, and cheddar piled into a fresh French butter croissant. Served with pan fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie Chilli Omelette
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. A wonderful spicy combo of Yucca's veggie chilli, cheddar, and green onion in a two-egg omelette topped with sour cream. Served with pan fries and toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Omurice
hasMenuItem.description: A delicious mixture of rice, vegetables, and diced chicken, wrapped up in a two-egg omelette and topped with homemade tomato sauce. Comes with salad ranch dressing.

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie Omelette with Cheese, Pan-Fries, and Toast
Cheese Scone Special
hasMenuItem.description: Yucca's homemade cheese scone, toasted and filled with two scrambled eggs, and shaved ham. Served with pan fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Corned Beef Scrambler
hasMenuItem.description: A scrumptious pile of pan fries, shredded corned beef, scrambled eggs, and grated cheddar! Served with toast.

hasMenuItem.name: Mexican Veggie Wrapsody
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Two scrambled eggs, cheddar, homemade salsa, and avocado in a warm flour tortilla. Topped with sour cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Mexican Chicken Wrapsody
hasMenuItem.description: Two scrambled eggs, chicken breast, cheddar, homemade salsa, bundled in a warm flour tortilla. Topped with sour cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Mexican Shrimp Wrapsody
hasMenuItem.description: Take Yucca's Mexican chicken wrapsody and substitute fresh shrimp for chicken! Topped with sour cream.

hasMenuSection.name: French Toast and Waffles - Breakfast Menu

hasMenuItem.name: French Toast, Bacon, and Pan Fries Special
hasMenuItem.description: Whole wheat bread, dipped in eggs, cream and cinnamon, then grilled to perfection. Served with bacon and pan fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Yucca Fried Banana French Toast
hasMenuItem.description: Take the French toast described above and top it with Yucca's sweet and scrumptious sauce of fried bananas, brown sugar, raisins, walnuts, and cinnamon. Served with bacon and pan fries. Nut allergy warning!

hasMenuItem.name: Humongous French Toast Platter
hasMenuItem.description: Only order this if you are Hungry!! Two big pieces of Yucca's French toast with two large eggs cooked how you like 'em, bacon, and loads of pan fries! This one will hold you 'til dinner.

hasMenuItem.name: Big Waffle Special
hasMenuItem.description: Two crispy waffles served with bacon and pan fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Just Peachy Waffles
hasMenuItem.description: Two yummy waffles, peaches, French vanilla yoghurt, and whipped cream. Served with bacon and pan fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Strawberry Icing Waffle
hasMenuItem.description: Strawberry and light cream cheese, topped with whipped cream, and comes with bacon and pan fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Fruity French Toast Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh banana and strawberry sandwiched between two slices of Yucca's French toast and topped with whipped cream. Served with pan fries and bacon.

hasMenuItem.name: Oaty French Toast
hasMenuItem.description: A healthy twist on an old favourite. Dipped in egg batter, rolled in rolled oats, and grilled to crispy perfection. Served with pan fries and ham.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheddar Cheese and Onion Pan Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian.

hasMenuItem.name: Hollandaise Sauce and Onion Pan Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian.

hasMenuItem.name: Mexican (Cheddar and Salsa) Pan Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian.

hasMenuItem.name: Pan Fries (As They Are)
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian.

hasMenuItem.name: Screamin' Hot Buzzard Pan Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian.

hasMenuItem.name: Sour Cream and Onion Pan Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian.

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy thick-cut, smoked to perfection.

hasMenuItem.name: Ham
hasMenuItem.description: Tender, savory sliced pork, perfectly cured and gently seasoned for a classic taste.

hasMenuItem.name: Turkey Sausage
hasMenuItem.description: Succulent Ground Turkey Sausage, Perfectly Spiced

hasMenuItem.name: Toast
hasMenuItem.description: Thick whole wheat.

hasMenuItem.name: Avocado
hasMenuItem.description: Fresh and creamy fruit with a rich taste, perfect for adding a touch of luxury to any dish.

hasMenuItem.name: Tomato
hasMenuItem.description: Tomato side, available fresh or grilled.

hasMenuItem.name: Fruit Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. A delicious blend of fresh-cut seasonal fruits cut fresh when you order!!

hasMenuItem.name: Deluxe Hot Wild Oats
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Deluxe hot wild oats with cinnamon, raisins, and sunflower seeds. Milk and brown sugar.

hasMenuItem.name: Plain Hot Wild Oats
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Just plain good. Served with milk and brown sugar.

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon, Lettuce, and Tomato Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Self explanatory and delicious!

hasMenuItem.name: Clubhouse Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: A bacon, lettuce, and tomato sandwich combined with a fresh turkey sandwich makes this triple-decker delight!

hasMenuItem.name: Cucumber, Cream Cheese, and Sprouts
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. A vegetarian's dream with lots of cukes, soft cream cheese, and piles of alfalfa sprouts.

hasMenuItem.name: Reuben Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: A masterpiece combining corned beef, Swiss cheese, and sauerkraut all on grilled rye bread!

hasMenuItem.name: Shrimp Clubhouse
hasMenuItem.description: Three layers of toasted whole wheat bread with loads of fresh shrimp, tomato, lettuce, and bacon, or avocado if you prefer).

hasMenuItem.name: Super Veggie
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. A medley of natural flavours. Avocado, cream cheese, cuke, carrot, onion, tomato, and sprouts.

hasMenuItem.name: Chuck's Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled cheese with avocado, ham, egg tomato, lettuce, and mayo.

hasMenuItem.name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: This is one mixed-up sandwich. Mixed up with chopped onion, pickle, and Mayo that is.

hasMenuItem.name: Tuna Cheddar Melt Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: A big, grilled sandwich with tuna, cheddar, sprouts, Dijon mustard, pickles, and onions.

hasMenuItem.name: Turkey Cranberry Salad Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Real turkey, cranberries, and mayo, mixed together and piled on thick.

hasMenuItem.name: Egg Salad Supreme
hasMenuItem.description: Hard-boiled eggs mixed up with green onion, red cabbage, carrot, and lettuce.

hasMenuItem.name: Ginger Chicken Marinade Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Marinated ginger chicken, Swiss cheese, onion, and lettuce.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. Simple comfort food just because you want it.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Cheese, Tomato, and Onion Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. All melty and tasty and yummy!

hasMenuItem.name: Shrimp Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Anything but shrimpy. Lots of fresh shrimp, onion, and sprouts.

hasMenuItem.name: Shrimp-Acado
hasMenuItem.description: A bucket of fresh shrimp teamed up with the incredible taste of avocado, onion, and sprouts.

hasMenuItem.name: Avocado, Cream Cheese and Sprouts Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. An incredible edible, exotic blend that'll make your taste buds smile.

hasMenuItem.name: Beyond Chicken Pesto and Cranberry Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken pesto, cranberry sauce, Swiss cheese, tomato, and mustard baked to perfection!

hasMenuItem.name: Corned Beef On Rye Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: A classic sandwich with a generous supply of freshly sliced corned beef.

hasMenuItem.name: Bacon Cheeseburger
hasMenuItem.description: Scrumptious with melted cheese, bacon, and lettuce.

hasMenuItem.name: Swiss and Mushroom Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Melted Swiss cheese and sautéed mushroom in spices. Topped with lettuce.

hasMenuItem.name: Cordon Bleu Chicken Burger
hasMenuItem.description: A classic combination of chicken and ham with melted Swiss cheese and lettuce.

hasMenuItem.name: Mexican Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Mexican burger with grated cheddar cheese, homemade salsa, topped with lettuce, and sour cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Screamin' Hot Buzzard Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy. Very spicy! Louisiana hot sauce, greet onion, tomato, crushed red chilli peppers, and lettuce.

hasMenuItem.name: Teriyaki Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Ah-so nice with teriyaki sauce, crushed pineapple, chopped onion, and lettuce.

hasMenuItem.name: Yucca Cheese Deluxe Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Very popular "Real comfort food", with cheese, tomato, onion, and lettuce.

hasMenuItem.name: BBQ Onion Deluxe Burger
hasMenuItem.description: We slather on the barbecue sauce and pile on the tomatoes, fried onions, and lettuce.

hasMenuItem.name: Big Snorker Burger
hasMenuItem.description: A big, beef patty with fried egg, bacon, cheddar, onions, tomato, and lettuce... Big!

hasMenuItem.name: Yucca's House Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetarian. A big, scrumptious tossed with salad with lettuce, veggies, nuts, and seeds, generously topped with Yucca's house dressing. With slice of tomato, cucumber, and whole wheat bread.

hasMenuItem.name: Shrimp Salad
hasMenuItem.description: A boatload of fresh shrimp tossed over Yucca's house salad with please any seafood lover. It comes with a slice of tomato and cucumber and a piece of whole wheat bread.

review.reviewBody: The eggs were nice and fluffy, and the crossiant had a good balance of fillings. The potatoes were super soft, well cooked. Only wish is a bit more ketchup (maybe a second packet) or another sauce as it would enhance the flavours. Would order again.
This is the best place ever
This place was is insanely over priced and even when you take the risk to order the biggest breakfast plate they have the portions are not giving
